item.title: Answered, thanks Weibs
item.dc:creator: @agarrison4 agarrison4
item.description:
@agarrison4 wrote:

Thanks Weibs!!!
I probly would have never noticed it, “It’s the little things that get me!” From Office Space

I will thank you in my script, even though no one will probly ever use it, and anyone could make their own twice as good…but it was a nice way to waste some time!

Finished here it is…

Program DragonFableAutoBosser; //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// //For use on http://www.dragonfable.com///////////////////////////////////////// //From Falconreach, click 'To Amityvale'//////////////////////////////////////// //Then start the script and let it do the rest////////////////////////////////// //I recommend using Cheat Engine and Max Hit/Hp cheat/////////////////////////// //Thanks to Weibs from http://moparisthebest.com for the help!////////////////// //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// //Once you start it, you have two seconds to click into the Dragonfable Client// //It will hide when it starts so you can easily click it//////////////////////// //and you wont see that ugly scar window =p///////////////////////////////////// //To stop it, press F12 and then press the stop botton////////////////////////// //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// var x1,x2,x3,x4,x5,x6,x7,x8,x9,y1,y2,y3,y4,y5,y6,y7,y8,y9:integer; begin sleep(2000);//Sleeps so you can click into DF client// repeat; if findcolor(x1,y1,5992673,599,77,697,98) then//looks for the 'Defend' button// clickmouse(x1,y1,true);//clicks 'Defend' button// repeat; sleep(100); until(findcolor(x2,y2,65535,308,377,484,420));//looks for 'Fight the Boss Monster' button// if findcolor(x2,y2,65535,308,377,484,420) then clickmouse(x2,y2,true);//clicks the 'Fight the Boss Monster' button// repeat; sleep(100); until(findcolor(x3,y3,16777215,276,420,469,438));//looks for 'Click anywhere to continue'// repeat; if findcolor(x3,y3,16777215,276,420,469,438) then clickmouse(x3,y3,true);//clicks to continue// sleep(100); until(findcolor(x4,y4,5992673,296,220,389,240));//looks for 'Extreme Mode' button// if findcolor(x4,y4,5992673,296,220,389,240) then clickmouse(x4,y4,true);//clicks 'Extreme Mode' button// repeat; sleep(100); until(findcolor(x5,y5,5473190,749,551,766,565));//looks for 'Fury' button// repeat;//'Fury' is for Mage, change to whatever is attack all monsters// if findcolor(x5,y5,5473190,749,551,766,565) then clickmouse(x5,y5,true);//clicks 'Fury' button// sleep(100); until(findcolor(x6,y6,2706804,336,238,423,286));//looks for 'ok' button// if findcolor(x6,y6,2706804,336,238,423,286) then clickmouse(x6,y6+150,true);//clicks 'ok' button// repeat; sleep(100); until(findcolor(x7,y7,16777215,423,378,465,392));//looks for 'Done' button// if findcolor(x7,y7,16777215,423,378,465,392) then clickmouse(x7,y7,true);//clicks 'Done' buttons repeat; sleep(100); until(findcolor(x8,y8,2045101,360,409,402,421));//looks for 'Close' button// if findcolor(x8,y8,2045101,360,409,402,421) then clickmouse(x8,y8,true);//clicks 'Close' button// repeat; sleep(100); until(findcolor(x9,y9,16777215,363,403,409,423));//looks for 'Keep' button// if findcolor(x9,y9,16777215,363,403,409,423) then clickmouse(x9,y9,true);//clicks 'Keep' button// repeat; sleep(100); until(findcolor(x1,y1,5992673,599,77,697,98));//looks for 'Defend' button// until(IsFKeyDown(12));//Will end if you press 'F12' key// end.

Read full topic

item.title: Answered, thanks Weibs
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

Program New; var xs,ys,ce,ye,x1,x2,x3,x4,x5,x6,x7,x8,x9,y1,y2,y3,y4,y5,y6,y7,y8,y9:integer; begin sleep(2000); repeat; if findcolor(x1,y1,5992673,599,77,697,98) then clickmouse(x1,y1,true); repeat; sleep(100); until(findcolor(x2,y2,65535,308,377,484,420)); if findcolor(x2,y2,65535,308,377,484,420) then clickmouse(x2,y2,true); repeat; sleep(100); until(findcolor(x3,y3,16777215,276,420,469,438)); repeat; if findcolor(x3,y3,16777215,276,420,469,438) then clickmouse(x3,y3,true); sleep(100); until(findcolor(x4,y4,5992673,296,220,389,240)); if findcolor(x4,y4,5992673,296,220,389,240) then clickmouse(x4,y4,true); repeat; sleep(100); until(findcolor(x5,y5,65535,331,375,428,430)); repeat; if findcolor(x5,y5,65535,331,375,428,430) then clickmouse(x5,y5,true); sleep(100); until(findcolor(x6,y6,2706804,336,238,423,286)); if findcolor(x6,y6,2706804,336,238,423,286) then clickmouse(x6,y6+150,true); repeat; sleep(100); until(findcolor(x7,y7,16777215,423,378,465,392)); if findcolor(x7,y7,16777215,423,378,465,392) then clickmouse(x7,y7,true); repeat; sleep(100); until(findcolor(x8,y8,2045101,360,409,402,421)); if findcolor(x8,y8,2045101,360,409,402,421) then clickmouse(x8,y8,true); repeat; sleep(100); until(findcolor(x9,y9,16777215,363,403,409,423)); if findcolor(x9,y9,16777215,363,403,409,423) then clickmouse(x9,y9,true); repeat; sleep(100); until(findcolor(x1,y1,5992673,599,77,697,98)); until(IsFKeyDown(12)); end.

You forgot a few parenthesis at the end of the if statements. Fixed.

Read full topic

item.title: Answered, thanks Weibs
item.dc:creator: @agarrison4 agarrison4
item.description:
@agarrison4 wrote:

program DragonFableAutoBosser; //For use on http://www.dragonfable.com//////////////// //From Falconreach, click 'To Amityvale'/////////////// //Then start the script and let it do the rest///////// //I recommend using Cheat Engine and Max Hit/HP Cheat// var xs,ys,ce,ye,x1,x2,x3,x4,x5,x6,x7,x8,x9,y1,y2,y3,y4,y5,y6,y7,y8,y9:integer; begin sleep(2000); repeat; if findcolor(x1,y1,5992673,599,77,697,98) then clickmouse(x1,y1,true); repeat; sleep(100); until(findcolor(x2,y2,65535,308,377,484,420)); if findcolor(x2,y2,65535,308,377,484,420) then clickmouse(x2,y2,true); repeat; sleep(100); until(findcolor(x3,y3,16777215,276,420,469,438)); repeat; if findcolor(x3,y3,16777215,276,420,469,438) then clickmouse(x3,y3,true); sleep(100); until(findcolor(x4,y4,5992673,296,220,389,240)); if findcolor(x4,y4,5992673,296,220,389,240 then clickmouse(x4,y4,true); repeat; sleep(100); until(findcolor(x5,y5,65535,331,375,428,430)); repeat; if findcolor(x5,y5,65535,331,375,428,430 then clickmouse(x5,y5,true); sleep(100); until(findcolor(x6,y6,2706804,336,238,423,286)); if findcolor(x6,y6,2706804,336,238,423,286) then clickmouse(x6,y6+150,true); repeat; sleep(100); until(findcolor(x7,y7,16777215,423,378,465,392)); if findcolor(x7,y7,16777215,423,378,465,392) then clickmouse(x7,y7,true); repeat; sleep(100); until(findcolor(x8,y8,2045101,360,409,402,421)); if findcolor(x8,y8,2045101,360,409,402,421) then clickmouse(x8,y8,true); repeat; sleep(100); until(findcolor(x9,y9,16777215,363,403,409,423)); if findcolor(x9,y9,16777215,363,403,409,423) then clickmouse(x9,y9,true); repeat; sleep(100); until(findcolor(x1,y1,5992673,599,77,697,98); until(IsFKeyDown(12)); end.

Yes, I realise this script has a few actions in it that make it longer and more complex than it could be, but i have bigger plans for this that require it…

I get…

Failed when compiling Line 21: [Error] (21:44): comma (',') expected in script

Any help appreciated!

Also, I hope this is correct forum, the “Other” forum doesn’t say its for help.

Read full topic
